instructions:
Peal and simmer the onions in salted water for 17 minutes or until tender. Drain and set aside. In a 1
quart sauce pan melt the margarine and stir in the flour. Heat until bubbly. Add the milk and salt. Stir and
cook until thick. Add the drained onions and warm until heated through. Pour into a warmed casserole and
shake on paprika. Serves 4. *(To add some color, cook 1/2 cup frozen peas, drain, set aside and add with the
onions to the sauce.)*
name: Creamed Pearl Onions
